subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Joe Johnson made his most critical shot on a fadeaway jumper over J. R. Smith with 22.3 seconds left to give the Nets a lead in the final minute, securing the 11th win in their last 13 games.
snippet: Joe Johnson made his most critical shot on a fadeaway jumper over J. R. Smith with 22.3 seconds left to give the Nets a lead in the final minute, securing the 11th win in their last 13 games.
